title: Solstice Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Only organic, fair-trade coffee and tea, made with organic sugar, chocolate, dairy, soy, rice and almond milk. Light lunches and snacks made with organic and/or locally grown and produced foods. Strives to help protect the environment and stimulate growth on the island. The cafe showcases local musical talent, improv theatre, poetry readings, and as a space for caf√© philosophy. Walls are used as a gallery to display the works of local photographers both amateur and professional.
